description: Number of points (x,y) in square lattice with (x-1/2)^2+(y-1/2)^2 <= n.
comments: Always a multiple of 4. Useful for rasterizing circles.
references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 106.
author: _Ken Takusagawa_, Oct 15 2000
